SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT041
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message requests the system to generate a SELECT status for the FIN application on a specified LT, or for all the LTs belonging to the sender's destination. The response to this message is an MT 061 Select Status Report for FIN.
From: User To: GPA or FIN

SystemField.Name: lt-code
SystemField.description: 9th character of BIC-12. The value X signifies details of all LTs belonging to the destination.
